FORNEY & NITECKI: FOSSIL MOLLUSCA 8S 

Hormotoma labradorensis Roy, 1932 
 Holotype: not designated, to be selected from P 23353 

Referred specimens: two specimens P 23353 (missing) 

Roy, 1932, pp. 37-38, pi. 2, figs. 1-2. 
 Lower Ordovician, Beekmantown 

Drift dolomite on Sculpin or Kanaiotok Island, 21 miles northeast of 
 Nain, northeastern Labrador, Canada. Collected by S. K. Roy, 
 Rawson-MacMillan Expedition, 1927-28. 

Remarks: Hormotoma = Murchisonia (Hormotoma) 
 Knight etal., 1960, p. 1291 

Hoimotoma latiangularis Branson, 1909 
 Holotype: by monotypy: UC 1 1552 
 Branson, 1909, p. 45, pi. 7, fig. 13 
 Middle Ordovician, Stones River Group, Auburn Chert. 
 Near Auburn, Lincoln County, Missouri. Collected by Stuart Weller, 

1896. 
 Remarks: Hormotoma = Murchisonia (Hormotoma) 
 Knight etal., 1960, p. 1291 

Hormotoma minuta Roy, 1932 
 Holotype: by original designation: P 23354 (missing) 

Roy, 1932, pp. 38-39, pi. 2, fig. 3 
 Lower Ordovician, Beekmantown. 

Drift dolomite on Sculpin or Kanaiotok Island, 21 miles northeast of 
 Nain, northeastern Labrador, Canada. Collected by S. K. Roy, 
 Rawson-MacMillan Expedition, 1927-28. 
 Remarks: Hormotoma = Murchisonia (Hormotoma) 
 Knight etal., 1960, p. 1291 

Hormotoma rotundivolvis Roy, 1941 
 Holotype: by original designation: P 28842 

Roy, 1941, p. Ill, text-fig. 78 
 Upper Ordovician, Richmond 

Silliman's Fossil Mount, Frobisher Bay, Baffin Land, Canada. 
 Collected by John Jaynes, Rawson-MacMillan Expedition, 1927- 
 1928. 
 Remarks: Hormotoma = Murchisonia (Hormotoma) 
 Knight etal., 1960, p. 1291
